name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Howard Neil SHIPLEY.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Howard Neil SHIPLEY.

opinions.text: Howard Neil Shipley, of Washington, District of Columbia, is ordered to show cause, within 40 days, why he should not be sanctioned for his conduct as a member of the Bar of this Court in connection with the petition No. 14-424, Sigram Schindler Beteiligungsgesellschaft MBH v. Lee.

casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Howard Neil SHIPLEY.
No. D-2827.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 8, 2014.
Opinion
